display_long_description:
Dive into the ultimate VR horror experience inspired by Gorilla Tag! This thrilling multiplayer game will have you running, climbing, and escaping from terrifying monsters lurking in the shadows. Test your reflexes and survival instincts as you navigate eerie maps filled with intense chases and heart-pounding moments.

Every day, you’ll receive 1,000 Shiny Rocks, the in-game currency, which you can use to purchase a variety of cosmetics from the store. Customize your character with unique hats, masks, and other accessories to stand out while you flee from monstrous creatures.

With an immersive atmosphere, terrifying sound design, and unpredictable monster AI, every match is a new nightmare waiting to unfold. Whether you’re playing with friends or braving the horror alone, this game will keep you on the edge of your seat. Will you escape, or will the monsters catch you first?

Prepare for a fast-paced, fear-inducing adventure unlike anything you’ve played before. Run, hide, survive… and don’t look back!v
